subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: After failing to make two cuts recently, perhaps all the world's top-ranked golfer really needed was a little rest before he starts his quest of a second U.S. Open crown starting Thursday.
snippet: After failing to make two cuts recently, perhaps all the world's top-ranked golfer really needed was a little rest before he starts his quest of a second U.S. Open crown starting Thursday.
